name: In re ESTATE OF Jane Torrance BAKER, Deceased. Appeal of F. J. Torrance BAKER, Executor of the Estate

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN, and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: In re ESTATE OF Jane Torrance BAKER, Deceased. Appeal of F. J. Torrance BAKER, Executor of the Estate.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each party pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Everett K. Dilworth, Tucker, Arensberg, Very & Ferguson, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Catherine R. Barone, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
433 A.2d 1337
In re ESTATE OF Jane Torrance BAKER, Deceased. Appeal of F. J. Torrance BAKER, Executor of the Estate.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 5, 1981.
Decided July 2, 1981.
Reargument Denied Aug. 20, 1981.
Everett K. Dilworth, Tucker, Arensberg, Very & Ferguson, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Catherine R. Barone, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN, and WILKINSON, JJ.
